metadata.synopsis: Geppetto (Drew Carey) gets his wish for a puppet to come to life but finds parenthood much harder than he expected.
metadata.genre: Comedy/Kids & Family/Musical & Performing Arts/Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television

reviews: I'm as amused as anyone when Carey breaks into song-and-dance. But half of that amusement is the sight of an amateur imitating a professional. Professionals can't afford to be amateurish.
